title: Rule 10

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Grant a player a Goal made by yourself, if the host accepts. If they refuse, you may keep doing this until the host accepts.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: -At the start of Day 1, all players' goals except yours are deleted. It you die, each player gets their goal back.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause at least one player to win.

desc:
Post 1966
*I make everyone feel depressed by removing their purpose in life.*
